p: This study highlighted that older people which was commonly assumed not to be a high-risk group for HIV-1 infection played an important role in the contribution of local HIV-1 transmission in Fuyang, Anhui Province, China. As the increasing numbers of older HIV-1 infected people were reported according to UNAIDS data, more attentions to older people should also be paid in other regions. By combining with demographic data, phylogenetic analysis was a useful tool can be applied to provide more tailored interventions which were definitely needed to the older people population subgroup.
